name: ParallaxCamera
shortDescription: Unified camera control across multiple layers with parallax and offset camera transformations.
description: Allows unified control and management of client cameras relative to one or more host cameras.
- Attach client camera(s) to a host camera (defaults to 1:1 camera tracking)
- Set custom parallax tracking scale multipliers and offsets for client camera attributes
- Set up multipe client-host camera relations
- Set up host hierarchies as layer groups for advanced view management
- Adjust host camera(s) using any camera controls
- Align every client camera attached to every host camera
- Align client cameras attached to a specific host camera
- Set camera [ center X | center Y | zoom | angle ] [ scale | offset ]
